main event: On 27 Aug 59, there was a multiple sighting of a UFO observed for a very short duration in Springfield & Fayetville, Ohio. The object disappeared like a meteor, but not as fast.
interesting points: The witness observed the object for 3-4 seconds and described it as a circular disk shape with a blue and dark, almost red color when observed at about 600 feet away.
The object was estimated to be 70-80 feet in diameter, and it moved slowly, descended rapidly, leveled off, and then accelerated rapidly to the south.
The witness reported that the sound associated with the object was 'rustling' and described its color as 'white.'
The object's edges were described as being 'fuzzy or blurred.'
The witness was located outdoors and was not in a vehicle at the time of the sighting, and the object was estimated to be around 1000 feet away.
sighted object: One UFO resembling a circular disk shape
